name: Real-jee6
tagline: It is an explanation project of JEE6 and servlet 3.0.
body:
Quick start
===

1. Run hsqldb server.

	```
	$ ./run-hsqldb-server.sh
	```

1. Open the other console.

1. Install modules and Run glassfish server.

	```
	$ ./run-server-local.sh
	```
	
1. Open web browser.


	[http://localhost:8080/realjee/](http://localhost:8080/realjee/)
